Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurring after \First Look-Your updates are overdue\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that reach \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ stage out of all manuscripts submitted
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of times \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ is followed by \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences that lead to a manuscript being accepted (followed by \RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ compared to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\ to understand bottleneck stages
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ that occur within 1 month of \First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ activities per variant, highlighting the most common paths to this stage
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'variant'}

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that reach \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ without requiring \SW–Major Revision due in 1 month\
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity != 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 month'"}

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as a precursor to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\ in the review process timeline
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ activities that occur after \First Look-Please submit updates\ within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ activities that lead to a final decision (accept or reject) within 3 months
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ followed by any activity related to revision (\RW–Minor Revision due in 3 days\, \RW–Major Revision due in 1 week\, etc.)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'RW–Minor Revision due in 3 days' or activity == 'RW–Major Revision due in 1 week'"}

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in relation to total activities performed by the SYSTEM performer
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ activities that are preceded by \First Look-Your updates are due in one week\ within a specific timeframe
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week'

Name: Number of manuscripts that enter the \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ stage more than once during their lifecycle
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
